articles.title: Antibody-immunotherapy combination shows promise in lung cancer - European Pharmaceutical Review
articles.description: Combining a PD1 inhibitor with dupilumab enabled certain patients to gain near-complete clinical response two months post-dose, research says.
articles.content:
Posted: 6 December 2023 | Catherine Eckford (European Pharmaceutical Review) | No comments yet
A study evaluating the combination of a PD1 inhibitor with dupilumab enabled one out of six lung cancer… [+3302 chars]
